name: High Noon Saloon (Genna Khudilaynen - MrWoodenSheep, Luu Argonaut, VittorioBellinello, Davide Perdon, SpacefaceDEV, Vassa, saharinax)
name_original: High Noon Saloon (Genna Khudilaynen - MrWoodenSheep, Luu Argonaut, VittorioBellinello, Davide Perdon, SpacefaceDEV, Vassa, saharinax)
description:
Serve drinks to your cowboy customers at a relentless saloon.

If they're unhappy with your service, take them out with your revolver!

Set the highest score you can, to prove you're the best gunslinging bartender in the west!


Vittorio Bellinello - Main Game Concept, Gameplay Designer, Soundtrack, Drink Logos, Modeling.

Genna Khudilaynen - Gameplay Designer,  Level Design, Customer Voices & Script, Drink Names.

Lyuboslav Nemtsov- Gameplay Designer, Player Interaction & Shooting

Edden Lav - Gameplay Designer, Customer & Bandit Implementation

Davide Perdon - Menus & UI, Leaderboard

Luca Vassilli - Liquid Shaders, VR Implementation

Sahar Yousefi- Customer & Bandit Art
